context_bundle.summary: API integration patterns: REST (HTTP methods, JSON), GraphQL (single endpoint, query language), gRPC (Protocol Buffers, high performance), WebSockets (real-time bidirectional). Auth: API keys, OAuth2, JWT. Rate limiting, retries with exponential backoff, error handling, request validation.

onboarding.quick_start: API patterns: REST (GET/POST/PUT/DELETE + JSON), GraphQL (query + mutations), gRPC (protobuf + fast), WebSockets (real-time). Auth: API keys (simple), OAuth2 (delegated), JWT (stateless). Implement: rate limiting, retry logic (exponential backoff), error handling (4xx/5xx), request validation.
common_patterns: gRPC: service UserService { rpc GetUser(UserRequest) returns (User); }
